data.title: Big Fish Games Website Changes
data.meta_description: We’re working toward streamlining our site and delivering a better shopping experience to our players. Phase One of a multi-phase update...
data.text:
We’re working toward streamlining our site and delivering a better shopping experience to our players. Phase One of a multi-phase update to the site will be live as of August 2, 2022. These changes were created with our player's feedback in mind. Please pardon our mess while our experience is still under construction.

Listed below are a summary of the changes to the website:

Website and Checkout

Big Fish Points are now available!

Change receipt/invoice language

Consolidated game categories

Removed Collector's Edition, Catch of the Week, and Top 100 pages

Increased search functionality within the store, including search by language

Add new payments via Checkout

Collector's Edition pricing has changed to $13.98/$19.98 USD.

Order History and Download pages have been separated

Users who haven't logged in within the last 24 months may need to reinput payment information.

Variable pricing for non-USD currencies, based upon the exchange rate*

Game Manager

Players encouraged to update to the latest version of the Game Manager to avoid loss of features

Latest Version:

PC: 3.5.0.0

MacOS: 3.3.1.37

Membership/Rewards

Game Club Credits have been replaced by Big Fish Points

Gift Certificates are no longer available for purchase

Existing gift certificates may still be redeemed

Debit/credit card or PayPal must be used when signing up for a Game Club subscription. This specific transaction cannot include the purchase of Big Fish Points.

Miscellaneous

Blog Walkthroughs are no longer be offered

Downloadable strategy guides are no longer offered

Forum no longer available

Sign-up for the Big Fish Games Splash Newsletter is currently unavailable

Coupon codes will no longer be needed to receive discounts during sales. The discounted price will be automatically reflected in the shopping cart during the checkout process.

* You may see an equivalent price in your local currency. The exchange rate is recalculated every 24 hours. Check with your banking institution regarding any potential fees associated with purchases in your preferred currency.
